actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt cooperative housing corporations from the provisions of section 277 of such Code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt cooperative housing corporations from provisions which limit the deductibility of transactions attributable to furnishing services, insurance, goods, or other items of value to members.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt cooperative housing corporations from the provisions of section 277 of such Code.
